article_title: Support for MercyRockford: Project boosts economy, strengthens health care

article_metadata.description: Editor’s note: Individuals and organizations from throughout the Rock River Valley have written letters of support for MercyRockford’s plan for a $400 million state-of-the-art facility near the intersection of East Riverside Boulevard and Interstate 90. The Rockford Register Star will publish some of those letters over the next few weeks.This letter is submitted in support of MercyRockford Health System’s three applications.I am a member of the Winnebago County Board and I
article_metadata.author: Ted Biondo
